markdown: # Media Partners Pharma Marketing News www.pharma-mkting.com Pharma Marketing News is the FREE monthly e-newsletter of the Pharma Marketing Network (www.pharma-mkting.com). The Network provides executive-level content coupled with targeted advertising opportunities. Send your press releases, job openings, product announcements, and educational events to our targeted, opt-in e-mail list of pharmaceutical marketing professionals. Current Medical Research and Opinion (CMRO), now in its 31st year, is a MEDLINE-indexed, peer-reviewed, rapid publication journal. Accepted manuscripts are published without page charges in 2-4 weeks via RapidTrack with specialist peer review usually requiring 2-3 weeks. Web address is www.CMROjournal.com. PMT PRODUCT MANAGEMENT TODAY Product Management Today is the only publication wholly focused on the marketing needs of today's pharmaceutical product managers. PMT's editorial mission is to provide the product management team with practical solutions to today's marketing challenges. The emphasis on practical, day-to-day solutions has made PMT a valuable tool to the product management team. PharmaVOICE PharmaVOICE is the executive forum that allows business leaders to engage in a candid dialogue on the myriad challenges and trends impacting the life-sciences industry. PharmaVOICE reaches more than 17,000 U.S.-based executives who influence business strategies and affect change. CanBiotech Biotech Business Portal A B2B Marketplace A Portal and B2B Outsourcing Marketplace for the Biopharma industry. The Marketplace features the Request for Quote Outsourcing Services Marketplace; the Portal features the biopharmaceutical directory, reports, and databases. www.canbiotech.com www.PharmCast.com is a pharmaceutical community based website which is visited by over 10,000 pharmaceutical professionals each week. It features the latest information on pharmaceutical patents, FDA, news, jobs and Buyer's Guide - information that enhances one's career. A portion of the profits from this program will be donated to a charitable organization. # Administrative Details ## Four Ways to Register: Fax: 360-666-3549 Mail: Pharmaceutical Education Associates 18705 NE Cedar Drive Battle Ground, WA 98604 Phone: 800-686-2276 Online: www.pharmedassociates.com Venue Information: The Westin Princeton at Forrestal Village 201 Village Boulevard Princeton, New Jersey 08540 Phone: 609-452-7900 Should you require overnight accommodations, please contact the hotel and let them know you are attending the Pharmaceutical Education Associates conference on Publication Planning 2003 to obtain the conference discount rate for rooms. ## Fees and Payments: Fees and Payments for attending Publication Planning 2003: Best Value: Conference and Full Day Tutorial ... $2195 Conference Only ... $1795 Full Day Tutorial Only ... $1095 EARLY REGISTRATION DISCOUNT: Register by August 8, 2003 and receive a $200 discount. The FDA/government employee rate is $595 and there is a 30% discount for academics (Valid identification will be required at the conference registration desk). Group Discounts are available. Please call Evan Smethurst at 831-465-2296 for more information. Make checks payable to Pharmaceutical Education Associates and write code P127 on your check. You may also use Visa, MasterCard or American Express. Payments must be received by October 29, 2003. Cancellations: If you cancel four weeks or more in advance of the conference you can expect a full refund or voucher to another Pharmaceutical Education Associates' event within the next calendar year. Cancellations occurring two to four weeks prior to the conference date receive a $200 refund or full voucher to another event. If you cancel less than two weeks prior to the conference date, you can expect a full credit voucher to be used at another Pharmaceutical Education Associates event within the calendar year. Note: Speakers and agenda subject to change without notice. In the event of a speaker cancellation, every effort to find a suitable replacement will be made. For information on sponsoring or exhibiting, please call Ian Rappaport at 212-558-6467 or email at irappaport@pharmedassociates.com

The Network provides executive-level content coupled with targeted advertising opportunities. Send your press releases, job openings, product announcements, and educational events to our targeted, opt-in e-mail list of pharmaceutical marketing professionals.

Current Medical Research and Opinion (CMRO), now in its 31st year, is a MEDLINE-indexed, peer-reviewed, rapid publication journal. Accepted manuscripts are published without page charges in 2-4 weeks via RapidTrack with specialist peer review usually requiring 2-3 weeks. Web address is www.CMROjournal.com.

PMT PRODUCT MANAGEMENT TODAY Product Management Today is the only publication wholly focused on the marketing needs of today's pharmaceutical product managers. The emphasis on practical, day-to-day solutions has made PMT a valuable tool to the product management team.

PharmaVOICE PharmaVOICE is the executive forum that allows business leaders to engage in a candid dialogue on the myriad challenges and trends impacting the life-sciences industry. PharmaVOICE reaches more than 17,000 U.S.-based executives who influence business strategies and affect change.

CanBiotech Biotech Business Portal A B2B Marketplace A Portal and B2B Outsourcing Marketplace for the Biopharma industry. The Marketplace features the Request for Quote Outsourcing Services Marketplace; the Portal features the biopharmaceutical directory, reports, and databases. www.canbiotech.com
www.PharmCast.com is a pharmaceutical community based website which is visited
by over 10,000 pharmaceutical professionals each week. It features the latest information on pharmaceutical patents, FDA, news, jobs and Buyer's Guide - information that enhances one's career.
A portion of the profits from this program will be donated to a charitable organization.

# Administrative Details ## Four Ways to Register: Fax: 360-666-3549 Mail: Pharmaceutical Education Associates 18705 NE Cedar Drive Battle Ground, WA 98604 Phone: 800-686-2276 Online: www.pharmedassociates.com Venue Information: The Westin Princeton at Forrestal Village 201 Village Boulevard Princeton, New Jersey 08540 Phone: 609-452-7900 Should you require overnight accommodations, please contact the hotel and let them know you are attending the Pharmaceutical Education Associates conference on Publication Planning 2003 to obtain the conference discount rate for rooms. ## Fees and Payments: Fees and Payments for attending Publication Planning 2003: Best Value: Conference and Full Day Tutorial ... $2195 Conference Only ... $1795 Full Day Tutorial Only ... $1095

EARLY REGISTRATION DISCOUNT: Register by August 8, 2003 and receive a $200 discount. The FDA/government employee rate is $595 and there is a 30% discount for academics (Valid identification will be required at the conference registration desk). Group Discounts are available. Please call Evan Smethurst at 831-465-2296 for more information. Make checks payable to Pharmaceutical Education Associates and write code P127 on your check. You may also use Visa, MasterCard or American Express. Payments must be received by October 29, 2003. Cancellations: If you cancel four weeks or more in advance of the conference you can expect a full refund or voucher to another Pharmaceutical Education Associates' event within the next calendar year. Cancellations occurring two to four weeks prior to the conference date receive a $200 refund or full voucher to another event. If you cancel less than two weeks prior to the conference date, you can expect a full credit voucher to be used at another Pharmaceutical Education Associates event within the calendar year. Note: Speakers and agenda subject to change without notice. In the event of a speaker cancellation, every effort to find a suitable replacement will be made.
For information on sponsoring or exhibiting, please call Ian Rappaport at 212-558-6467 or email at irappaport@pharmedassociates.com
